cards.text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

cards.text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.

cards.name: Psychic Transfer
cards.text: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.

cards.name: Ransack
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.

cards.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
